text: Where youâ€™re (present status of your product)
suggestion: The product is a schoolbag. We have had about 50 customers since we started three weeks ago. Most of the customers are friends and family. The product has succeeded in its initial stage.

text: Where you want to be (future goals of your product).
suggestion: We want to reach at least 1500 customers in the next 15 months. This would require consistently selling the same amount at a steady rate. Then for the next three years, ideally, we would like to double the sales.

text: Questions to fill all gaps of obstacles that prevent you from thinking ahead with solutions.
suggestion: We might face competition from other schoolbag sellers. But we can differentiate our product with the aspects of affordability, sustainability, and an add-on tag for protection. We will also communicate our values through marketing and advertising to showcase our vision of education and the accessories used by kids.

text: Conclude with a clear idea of how to get where you want to be.
suggestion: Partnerships with schools and other educational institutions
